com.amihaiemil.eva

Interface Eva

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleEvolutionaryAlgorithm

    public interface Eva
    Interface of an evolutionary algorithm implementation.
    Author:
    Mihai Andronache (amihaiemil@gmail.com)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Solution calculate()
      Run the algorithm, calculate the solution.
      Eva with(BestSelection bestSelection)
      Optionally, you can specify how the best solution is selected from the population.
      Eva with(Condition additionalStoppingConditions)
      Optionally, you can specify additional stopping conditions that the found solution has to meet.
      Eva with(FitnessEvaluator evaluator)
      It is mandatory to specify a fitness evaluator.
      Eva with(Selection selection)
      Optionally, you can specify the way an individual solution is selected from the population (i.e.
      Eva with(SolutionsGenerator generator)
      It is mandatory to specify a solution generator.

    • Method Detail

      • calculate

        Solution calculate()
        Run the algorithm, calculate the solution.
        Returns:
        The found solution.

      • with

        Eva with(FitnessEvaluator evaluator)
        It is mandatory to specify a fitness evaluator.
        Parameters:
        evaluator - The evaluator that this algorithm works with.
        Returns:
        A new, copied instance, of this algorithm, with the specified FitnessEvaluator.

      • with

        Eva with(SolutionsGenerator generator)
        It is mandatory to specify a solution generator.
        Parameters:
        generator - The generator that this algorithm works with.
        Returns:
        A new, copied instance, of this algorithm, with the specified SolutionsGenerator.

      • with

        Eva with(Condition additionalStoppingConditions)
        Optionally, you can specify additional stopping conditions that the found solution has to meet.
        Parameters:
        additionalStoppingConditions - The added condition(s).
        Returns:
        A new, copied instance, of this algorithm, with the specified Condition.

      • with

        Eva with(Selection selection)
        Optionally, you can specify the way an individual solution is selected from the population (i.e. when selecting the parents to create a new solution). By default, the best out of 2 randomly chosen solution is selected.
        Parameters:
        selection - The Selection implementation.
        Returns:
        A new, copied instance, of this algorithm, with the specified Selection.

      • with

        Eva with(BestSelection bestSelection)
        Optionally, you can specify how the best solution is selected from the population. By default, the solution with the highest fitness is considered the best.
        Parameters:
        bestSelection - The BestSelection implementation.
        Returns:
        A new, copied instance, of this algorithm, with the specified BestSelection.
